name: CMAbsoluteAltitudeData
desc: Data that records a change in absolute altitude.

items.name: var altitude: Double
items.desc: The absolute altitude of the device relative to sea level, measured in meters.

items.name: var accuracy: Double
items.desc: The estimated uncertainty of the altimeter in meters, based on one standard deviation.

items.name: var precision: Double
items.desc: The recommended resolution for the altitude, in meters.
